actions.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 112-113, by Mr. Nugent.

Points of order against provisions in the bill for failure to comply with clause 2 of rule XXI are waived. During the 112th Congress, it shall not be in order to consider an amendment to a general appropriation bill proposing both a decrease in an appropriation designated pursuant to section 301 of H. Con. Res. 34 and an increase in an appropriation not so designated, or vice versa.
Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 47.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 320.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 247 - 168 (Roll no. 479).
On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by recorded vote: 251 - 173 (Roll no. 480).
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

official_title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2219) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2219) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012.

titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 2219) making appropriations for the Department of Defense for the fiscal year ending September 30, 2012, and for other purposes.
